content: Sometimes I’m not angry, I’m hurt and there’s a big difference.
Not available for busy people☺
I do not exist to impress the world. I exist to live my life in a way that will make me happy.
Everything is getting expensive except some people, they are getting cheaper.
My phone screen is brighter than my future 🙁
Anger is a feeling that makes your mouth work than faster your mind..
This man, is man, a man, good man, way man, to man, keep man, an man, idiot man, busy man, for man, 30 man, seconds man! NOW READ WITHOUT MAN
Sometimes the best way to get someone\’s attention is to stop giving them yours.
People like to bring up your past, when your present and future look better than theirs.
Wakeup>job>noluv>daaru>sleep>repeat..
To all u Haters!!! Thanks for making me famous. I don’t give a Sh***t if u talk behind my back.
Its hurts the worst when the person that made you feel so special yesterday makes you feel so unwanted today.
Life is too short don’t waste it by reading my whatsapp status
If I treated you the way you treat me, you would hate my guts.
Girls r like potato chips…you can’t have 1
Had you asked for my life i would have sacrificed it with a smile… but you’ve stripped me of my pride
People always miss you more when they find out how much happier you are without them.
People change for one of two reasons: They have learned a lot, or they have been hurt too many times.
If you fail and feels the shame then you are only few steps away from success ☺
You get betrayed by people you never thought of…
Does your ass ever get jealous of all the shit that comes out of ur mouth?
When you give lots of importance to someone, you loss your own importance in their life….
There are no solutions when you only focus on the negative
Out of every negative is a positive.. its up to you to find out what it is and utilize it..
If you always focus on the negative you will never see the positive!!!
Negativity is a cancer of the soul that spreads like the flu..
If you realized how powerful your thoughts are, you would never think a negative thought.
When life give u lemons, squeeze it in people’s eyes ….
I’m take a nice long shit, so don’t stress me !
Don’t disturb me, I am disturbed enough already.
Please don’t interrupt me while I’m ignoring you
Stop letting the world change you. Be yourself and change the world.
Just when I think things are looking up, here comes the Fuck up Fairy again. Why can’t things go right for a change?
Looking at the past, yeah…Alot of it hurt but you know it only made me stronger.
You talk behind my back only because you are afraid to say things to my face.
why does no one ever want to talk in an elevator?
What you heard is not what I said. Listen better next time.
Think again before you assume, And next time don’t be so quick to judge. You’ll never know what it’s like to be in my shoes.
is wishing that SOME people would understand that: IT’S NOT ALL ABOUT YOU!!
Go ahead and ignore me,..I can play that game too, and I’m probably better at it than you are…
No time for disrespectful, immature, selfish individuals!
Ever notice its those people saying they hate drama that start it? It doesn’t make sense to me.
is wondering if certain people have to work to be annoying or if it just comes naturally
The people that work hard don’t get the credit.The people that just do nothing get everything.
There are a few people out there who are just like trees; they take forever to grow up.
ugh. your so fake i bet if you look at the bottom of your foot it say made in china
Life is to short to let other people get to you, If they can’t handle who I am then I don’t need them in my life!
I don't care about what others think about me, I just care about what I think about myself.
People are selfish now a days.
Don’t tell me to change, I can’t perfect myself anymore.
You killed what was left of the good in me.
I never dreamed about success. I worked for it.
If you don't like me remember it's mind over matter, I don't mind and you don't matter.
Be yourself because an original is worth more than a copy.
Yes i am selfish i don’t want to share you with people.
I'm only selfish when it comes to you.
I done what i like, i don't care what you think?
I am who I am, your approval isn't needed.
I'd rather be hated for being real, than loved for being fake.
Be good to yourself, you’re all you’ve got.
I am simple, complex, generous, selfish, unattractive, beautiful, lazy, and driven.
Beauty captures your attention, but personality captures your heart.
You left without a reason, so please don't come back with an excuse.
I’m born to express, not to impress.
If your ego speaks with me then my attitude replies to you.
Before you judge me, Make sure that you’re perfect.
I don’t treat people badly, I treat them accordingly.
My life ,my rule,that’s my attitude…
If you dont want me , Dont fuck with my feelings.
Never Love Someone At The Cost Of Your Dignity And Self Respect...!!!
Beauty is only skin deep.Attitude is down to the bone.
You treated me like an option, so i left you like a choice
There are two ways to be happy: Change your situation, or change your mindset towards it.
Your attitude may hurt me, But mine can Kill You!!
I'm a very private person. You don’t ask i don’t tell.
I am not your toy.
Sometimes I want to treat people how they treat me But I don’t because It’s out of my character.
If you ever think I am ignoring you, I swear I am. My phone is in my hand 24×7
Take care of Your Status, don’t be care taker of My Status
If there is no one to hold your hand put your hands in your pocket and continue your walk.
Don’t be afraid of being outnumbered , eagles fly alone. Pigeons flock together.
I am who i am and i won't change for anyone.
I don’t care for people, who don’t care for me.
Nobody can teach me who I am.
Yes, I’m smiling. But you’re not the reason anymore.
Choose me or lose me. I am not a backup plan, and definitely not a second choice.
I don’t go crazy. I am crazy. I just go normal from time to time….
Never, never, never, never give up.
There’s a difference between somebody who wants you and somebody who would do anything to keep you. Remember that.
Before you judge me, Make sure that you’re perfect.
I dont have enough middle fingers to show you how i feel.
Yes, i have changed. Pain does that to People.
Dear Girls, Stop comparing all guys with your ex. Not all of us are players and jerks.
The bravest thing I ever did was continuing my life when I wanted to die.
Show me, don't tell me.
I don’t fear commitment, I fear wasting my time.
I live, I love, I fight, I cry, but I never give up
How he treats you is how he feels about you.
Someone Asked me what is UR attitude then i simply replied... " BEING SINGLE IS MY ATTITUDE…"
My attitude depends on the people in front of me.
Im not selfish but whats Mine is MINE . End of story
if you want me let me know, if you dont, please gently let me go.
They laughed at me because I'm different. I laughed at them because they're all the same.
I don’t insult people , I just describe them.
Two fundamentals of cool life – Walk like you are the king OR walk like you don’t care ,who is the king.
I trusted you but now your words mean nothing to me, because your actions spoke the truth.
If you like me Then raise your hand, If not then raise your standard.
Beauty Fades After Time, But Personality Is Forever!
Dear broken hearted girls , Hold your head up high and you middle finger higher , let him know what he is missing
Be a girl with a mind, a bitch with an attitude, and a lady with class.
I have no need for people who come to me when they need me,then throw me aside when they're fine.
This is how it goes. I will respect those who respect me & forget those who forget me. Simple as that.
When Sum One Hates You for no reason. Give them a reason.
Never give up on something you love
Excellence is not a skill, It is an attitude.
If you want me, come and get me. If you want me to come, forget it.
Good girls are bad girls, who never get caught.
To keep a relationship, you must keep your business to yourself and your partner, The whole world doesnt need to know your problems.
If your are still hate me!then No Problem!.
Problem is not a problem, but problem is that,is your attitude towards the problem.
Girls are like parking spaces, all the good ones are already taken.
Seeing your ex go through what they put you through.. Priceless.
Stop asking for faithful girls, when you are too busy chasing hoes.
The only difference between a good day and a bad day is your attitude.
I don't trust easily. So when I tell you that "I trust you", please don't make me regret it.
I'm Not a Tumblr Girl, But I'm Beautiful
To all the girls that say gentlemen don't exist anymore: They do exist but gentlemen are attracted to ladies. Not sluts.
Don't even try and judge me dude,You have no idea what the Fuck I've been through.
If you want me let me know. If you don't, please gently let me go.
Putting in headphones, to avoid people's bullshit.
i am scared to see you with someone else.
Silence is the best way to react while angry.
I hate the moment when suddenly my anger turns into tears.
Silence is the best way to react while angry.
Some things can never be forgotten and nor forgiven.
There are no words to describe the anger and frustration that I am feeling right now.
Don't make so many promises when you can't even keep one.
Sometimes i’m not angry, i’m hurt and there’s a big difference.
It’s better to cry than to be angry because anger hurts others, while tears flow silently through the soul and cleaneses the heart..
If I delete your number, you’re basically deleted from my life.
Getting angry is actually punishing yourself with the mistakes of others.
Some people never realise the emotional and mental damage they do to others.
Your mistake is letting me go, my mistake was letting you in.
Nobody makes you angry, you decide to use anger as a response.
The same person who said the sweetest things to me also said some of the meanest things I've ever heard.
Never forget what someone says to you when they are angry, because that’s when the truth comes out
When we don’t know who to hate, we hate ourselves.
Some people need to open their small minds instead of their big mouths.
Anger is a feeling that makes your mouth work faster than your mind.
When you are angry, your text speed increases by a ridiculous amount.
For every minute you are angry….. you lose sixty seconds of happiness… Think about It
It sucks when you realize you rejected other people for that one person who wasted your time.
Anger is our natural deffense against pain. So when i say i hate you, it really means you hurt me.
Everything is getting expensive except some people, they are getting cheaper…
Anger is poison. You must purge it from your mind or else it will corrupt your better nature.
They say milk is good for your teeth. You know what else is good for your teeth? Minding your own damn business.
Anger makes you smaller, while forgiviness forces you to grow beyond what you were..
